name: Eliud Khayo
title: Director & Head of Operations
expertise: PhD Economist specializing in health economics and statistical analysis
summary: Eliud brings extensive expertise in economics research and operations management. With a PhD in Economics and advanced skills in statistical analysis, he leads operational excellence and strategic economic initiatives for Lesar Consults.

education.description: With a Doctorate of Philosophy (PhD) in Economics from the University of Nairobi (Kenya), he has over 14 years in economic research and experience. His background enables him to demystify socio-economic modeling, forecasting, and strategic planning.

Master of Arts (M.A.) in Economics from the Department of Economics, University of Nairobi (Kenya), which is an enabler to demystify socio-economic modeling, forecasting opinions, and planning methodologies.
Bachelor of Economics & Statistics from the University of Nairobi (Kenya), which makes him an all-around economist with strong foundation in statistical analysis and economic theory.
Advanced Certificate in Project Management from a recognized training provider, focusing on methodologies and best practices for complex research and development initiatives.

competencies: Advanced Statistical Analysis (R, STATA, Python, SPSS)
contributions: Led economic impact assessments for major healthcare initiatives
Developed statistical frameworks for policy evaluation
Streamlined operational processes improving efficiency by 40%
Published research on healthcare economics in peer-reviewed journals

name: Japheth Athanasio
title: Director & CEO
expertise: PhD Candidate in Health Systems Strengthening & Financing
summary: Japheth is a visionary leader with deep expertise in health systems strengthening and financing. As CEO, he guides Lesar Consults' strategic direction while maintaining hands-on involvement in critical healthcare policy and financing initiatives.

education.degree: PhD (Candidate) in Health Systems Strengthening & Financing
education.description: Currently pursuing a PhD focusing on innovative approaches to health systems strengthening and sustainable financing mechanisms across developing countries; doctoral research undertaken through a recognised program affiliated with Centre for Excellence in Management/Health Systems (as noted in profile).

education.degree: MSc in Health Policy and Management
education.description: Master of Science (MSc) in Health Systems Management Application from the Department of Health Informatics, Kenyatta University, providing expertise in health system governance, policy analysis, and strategic health management.

Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Public Health from Kenyatta University (Kenya), providing a comprehensive foundation in public health principles, epidemiology, health promotion and community health approaches.

contributions: Founded Lesar Consults and grew it to a leading advisory firm
Advised on health financing reforms across multiple countries
Led strategic partnerships with international development organizations
Championed evidence-based approaches to health systems strengthening

projects.title: National Health Financing Strategy
projects.impact: Designed sustainable financing model for national health system

projects.title: Multi-Country Health Systems Assessment
projects.impact: Evaluated health systems across 8 African countries

name: Jamlick Karumbi
title: Lead Consultant, Epidemiologist
expertise: PhD Epidemiologist with expertise in disease surveillance and public health research
summary: Jamlick is a seasoned epidemiologist with a PhD and extensive experience in disease surveillance, outbreak investigation, and public health research. He leads epidemiological studies and provides technical expertise on health security initiatives.

education.description: Doctor of Philosophy (PhD) in Applied Epidemiological Health Research from the University of Liverpool, specialising in infectious disease epidemiology, surveillance systems, and public health emergency preparedness.
Master of Science (MSc) in Public Health from the London School of Hygiene & Tropical Medicine (LSHTM), with concentration in epidemiological methods, biostatistics and population health research.
Certificate in Disease Surveillance from recognised public health training (as listed in the profile), focusing on outbreak detection and epidemiological intelligence for public health security.
Advanced training in outbreak investigation methodologies and field epidemiology from accredited field epidemiology training programmes and public health institutions.

contributions: Led epidemiological investigations for major disease outbreaks
Developed surveillance systems for infectious disease monitoring
Published extensively on epidemiological methods and findings
Trained public health professionals across the region

projects.title: Regional Disease Surveillance System
projects.impact: Enhanced early warning capabilities across 12 health facilities

name: Wairimu Maina
title: Lead Consultant, Economist & Financial Analyst
expertise: Senior economist specializing in financial analysis and economic policy
summary: Wairimu is a distinguished economist and financial analyst with deep expertise in economic policy analysis, financial modeling, and development economics. She leads economic assessments and provides strategic financial guidance for complex development projects.

education.description: Master of Science (MSc) in Economics from a recognised institution (profile lists advanced training in development economics and econometrics), providing advanced analytical capabilities in development economics and policy evaluation.

Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Finance and Economics from a recognised university (as noted in the profile), providing a comprehensive understanding of financial markets, economic theory, and quantitative analysis methods.
Progress towards Chartered Financial Analyst (CFA) Level II certification (professional credential in investment analysis and portfolio management) as recorded in the profile.
Certificate in Development Economics from an accredited training provider (profile notes specialised training in emerging markets, poverty analysis and sustainable development strategies).

contributions: Conducted economic impact assessments for major infrastructure projects
Developed financial models for sustainable development initiatives
Advised on economic policy reforms and fiscal strategies
Led cost-benefit analyses for international development programs

name: Benjamin Mutuku
title: Lead Consultant, GIS & Spatial Analysis
expertise: GIS specialist with advanced expertise in spatial analysis and geospatial technologies
summary: Benjamin is a highly skilled GIS specialist with extensive experience in spatial analysis, mapping, and geospatial technology applications. He leads spatial analysis projects and provides technical expertise on location-based research and planning initiatives.

education.description: Master of Science (MSc) in Geographic Information Systems from a recognised university (profile lists advanced training in spatial analysis and geospatial technologies), providing advanced skills in spatial analysis and location intelligence.

education.degree: BSc in Geography and Spatial Planning
education.description: Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Geography and Spatial Planning from a recognised university (as stated in the profile), providing foundational knowledge in geographical analysis, land use planning and spatial development strategies.
Certificate in Remote Sensing from an accredited training provider (profile notes specialist training in satellite imagery analysis and earth observation applications).
Advanced GIS Certification from a professional institution covering advanced GIS applications, spatial modelling and geospatial database management.

contributions: Developed GIS solutions for health facility mapping and planning
Led spatial analysis for disease distribution and risk mapping
Created interactive mapping platforms for stakeholder engagement
Trained teams on GIS applications in public health and development

projects.title: Disease Risk Mapping Platform
projects.impact: Enhanced surveillance and response planning capabilities
